purpose_text.para: Provides information on the events that an auxiliary activity monitor event counter AMEVCNTR1<n> counts.

field_description.para: Event to count. The event number of the event that is counted by the auxiliary activity monitor event counter AMEVCNTR1<n>.
It is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED what values are supported by each counter.
If software writes a value to this field which is not supported by the corresponding counter AMEVCNTR1<n>, then:

listitem.content: It is UNPREDICTABLE which event will be counted.
The value read back is UNKNOWN.

field_description.para: The event counted by AMEVCNTR1<n> might be fixed at implementation. In this case, the field is read-only and writes are UNDEFINED.
If the corresponding counter AMEVCNTR1<n> is enabled, writes to this register have UNPREDICTABLE results.

access_permission_text.para: If <n> is greater than or equal to the number of auxiliary activity monitor event counters, reads and writes of AMEVTYPER1<n> are UNDEFINED.

note.para: AMCGCR.CG1NC identifies the number of auxiliary activity monitor event counters.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
